bro, who hurt you...

but ngl i had similar insecurities. when i was school there was a tendency for the girls to send their friends to ask the person out for them. but due to inferiority complex i never found out if any of those were real as i took for certain that if the girl did not ask themselves then their friends are just trying to make fun of me. but id never act out like this dood though. id have anxiety but i would not lash out at the girl, instead id  lash out and attack myself. i'd call myself stupid and worthless for having these thoughts and if my fears would have been true i would have attacked myself for being so stupid and getting fooled but not attributing fault on the girl for tricking me. because of course she would trick me, i deserve to be tricked and made a fool out of because i'm worse than everyone in existence...

Protag is super insecure and paranoid. That said, this guy won the lottery since he got a girl that was a) cute, b) shared his hobbies, c) was easy to get along with, and d) was actually willing to have a relationship with him. The "marry me" thing I consider half-punch line, half-wish fulfillment. Not bad, IMO.
If any reddit incels want to know why they can't get a girlfriend, just tell them to look at this and imagine themselves in the girl's place.
Well they did smash

Damn this reeks of insecurity. An otaku weeb with no social life and just THE biggest persecution complex with no social skills to boot gets a cute girl to invite him over, needs constant reassurance that he isn't being set up as this girl just throws herself at him despite his 0 for 0 likable or redeeming traits on display there. And then after he discovers "ZOMG she's totally into anime like me!!" Asks her to marry him and she's just like "ok" instead of being creeped out. This is a projection fantasy at it's finest. If this were a series I'd bet he'd have a harem of a bunch of pretty, interesting, popular girls who are all super into him despite his shocking lack of basic social skills. And they'd all be virgins with no interest in any other men yet somehow perfectly willing to toss their virginity to a guy they've maybe known a week because...he's nice? And by nice I mean he doesn't abuse them. GOD this stuff is pandery
